bibl.title: The Encounter of Alexander with the Brahmans: New Fragments of the Cynic Diatribe P. Genev. inv. 271.
bibl.note: Two addit. fragm. to P. Gen. Inv. 271 (= Pack2 2580), described by W.H. Willis at the XVIII Int. Congr. of Pap., Athens 1986. Reconstructed text, later versions, notes and translation.

bibl.idno: P. Gen. Inv. 271 + P. Robinson Inv. 40

bibl.note: Willis William H. and Klaus Maresch, The Encounter of Alexander with the Brahmans: New Fragments of the Cynic Diatribe P. Genev. inv. 271.
141.4 P. Colon. Inv. 907 + P. Gen. Inv. 271 + P. Robinson Inv. 40
